name: Ruskie
description:
Game created during Slavic Game Jam 2018, by Part-Time Kamikaze team.

  1. Go to client folder
  2. Run npm install (needs node.js CLI to be installed)
  3. Run npm start 
  4. Enjoy game under http://localhost:8080

Contols - 'A' key for Janusz, 'G' for Isabela and 'K' for Bohun.
